about.title: HOW WE GOT STARTED IN THIS BUSINESS
about.p1: FEDERICO DEVESA IS A WORLD-CLASS BOXING COACH AND COMPETITOR WITH YEARS OF EXPERIENCE IN THE RING AND AS A MENTOR. HIS TECHNIQUE-DRIVEN APPROACH HAS HELPED HUNDREDS OF ATHLETES REFINE THEIR CRAFT, FROM FUNDAMENTAL FOOTWORK TO ADVANCED COUNTER-PUNCHING STRATEGIES.
about.p2: THE 2026 EUROPEAN TOUR IS BORN FROM A PASSION TO SPREAD 'REAL BOXING FOR EVERYONE'. BY BRINGING PROFESSIONAL-LEVEL MASTERCLASSES TO ACADEMIES ACROSS THE CONTINENT, FEDERICO AIMS TO ELEVATE THE STANDARD OF BOXING TRAINING AND BUILD A GLOBAL COMMUNITY OF DISCIPLINED FIGHTERS.
